infographics.title: Teens and E-cigarettes
infographics.field_teaser: This infographic explores e-cigarette use among teens, including usage rates compared with cigarette use, potential for e-cig use to lead to smoking, and what teens say is in their e-cig, as well as avenues for teens’ exposure to e-cig advertising.

infographics.title: Substance Use in Women and Men
infographics.field_teaser: This infographic shows differences in substance use trends between women and men for marijuana use disorder, abuse of prescription pain medicines, treatment admissions for sleeping aid misuse, and nicotine cessation.

infographics.title: Drug and Alcohol Use in College-Age Adults in 2014
infographics.field_teaser: The 2014 Monitoring the Future College Students and Adults survey shows trends in alcohol, marijuana, nicotine, and stimulant use in college students and non-college peers.

infographics.title: Monitoring the Future 2015 Survey Results
infographics.field_teaser: NIH’s 2015 Monitoring the Future survey shows long term decline in illicit drug use, prescription opioid abuse, cigarette and alcohol use among the nation’s youth.

infographics.title: Dramatic Increases in Maternal Opioid Use and Neonatal Abstinence Syndrome
infographics.field_teaser: Use of opiates during pregnancy can result in a drug withdrawal syndrome in newborns called neonatal abstinence syndrome (NAS). One baby per hour is born suffering from opiate withdrawal in the U.S.
